General.Name: Wingstop Inc
General.Description: Wingstop Inc., together with its subsidiaries, franchises and operates restaurants under the Wingstop brand name. Its restaurants offer classic wings, boneless wings, and tenders that are cooked-to-order, and hand-sauced-and-tossed in various flavors. Wingstop Inc. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Addison, Texas.
General.Address: 15505 Wright Brothers Drive, Addison, TX, United States, 75001
